meanings.sent1: She is reintroducing her favorite book to her friends.
meanings.sent2: The teacher is reintroducing the topic for better understanding.
meanings.sent3: He kept reintroducing himself to the same person by mistake.
meanings.sent4: The old tradition was reintroduced into the modern world.
meanings.sent5: The chef is reintroducing a classic dish with a new twist.

meanings.definition: To bring (something) back into use or existence
meanings.sent1: The company is reintroducing their popular product to the market.
meanings.sent2: The museum is reintroducing ancient artifacts for display.
meanings.sent3: The magician kept reintroducing the same rabbit during the show.
meanings.sent4: Her smile reintroduced warmth into the room.
meanings.sent5: The rain is reintroducing life to the dry land.
